title: Can't transfer server
body: I've been waiting to transfer my account so i sent a ticket to riot support and they told me that server transfers should be open on 20 November but so far the transfer option is still not showing up. Am i missing something here because I'm confused as hell. It'd  be great if I could transfer within the hour.            Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Hey guys, it looks like transfers have been delayed.  I don't have a lot of info on this yet, but I'll offer updates as they come.
Finally someone who actually decided to give us an update, thanks for the info but do you have any idea when it'll be up?
Sorry for the delay, I'm coming back from weekend and catching up on everything.  :(  I don't have a clue right now, but I'll try to get more info and see if we can get some messaging out.
can we get someone from riot to respond to this please?

are they even aware of this problem?

maybe they just forgot about us globetrotter? :/
When will it finally work? Give us at least the status information so we know when we can expect it
This is ridiculous it's JANUARY! And I still can't move regions, now I can't play the  new season on EU West... Cmon Riot! Give us some answers!
Still no transfers after nearly two months later, what is going on.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

This was sent to me regarding the region transfer issue. 
This is borderline unacceptable. 

Hey there,

It’s me Hidden Ki from the Account Team! Unfortunately due to technical difficulties, our transfers will be down for far longer than we were anticipating. I can’t give you an ETA at the moment, but it should be up within 4 weeks.

In the meantime, be sure to periodically check our update page to see when the transfers become available.

We know how much this has to suck for you and we sincerely apologize for the major inconvenience this has caused you.

Just know our team is doing there absolute best to get the transfers up and running again as fast as humanly possible.

Hidden Ki
Billing and Account Support
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  Talk about annoying and inconvenient.

That is ridiculous, it's about time, if you say on the 20th and we wait patiently for more than 2-3 weeks the least you can do is give us an update when you are 2 days late on your mark!!!!!

Disgrace!!!

You try playing from Europe in OCE servers with 345 ping constant.

:(
I feel ya, I'm in UAE trying to play NA with 240 ping. I've been waiting since October and when the day comes in super excited just to be disappointed and forced to wait longer...
same here still waiting and nothing ..
Any update on this? jesus christ

Still cant transfer yet. 
Cmon Riot, I have move to Japan 2 months!!!
It is 2018 still no transfer options.
i have this problem too i lived in bulgaria but i moved in america and i want to transfer my acc but i cant help please

I cheked it out because i though Tranfers was supposed to work, and i found a guy which sended a message to Riot support.
"made msg to riot support thats what they said:"
PapaBear (Riot Games Player Support)
Nov 20, 4:24 PM PST
Hey there!
I'm PapaBear from the Account Recovery Support Squad. Sadly, transfers are still down right now. We have some minor repairs that need to be done on our back end before we can open them up, but we will give a notice once they're up and ready to go ^__^
Be sure to check out the League News for any announcements of when transfers are open again.
Let me know if you have any other questions,
Thanks for understanding!
PapaBear
Player Support
Ursine Commander
Well i mean an update on the situation would have been great but i guess we have to wait a few more days or even weeks to transfer. Seems like Riot just doesn't care anymore.
Nothing yet, a lot of hours later, patch 7.23, no transfers...
Game updated and everything for 7.23 annnnnnd still no server transfer.... wtf like we shoulda been able to transfer yesterday

I have the same problem...
riot please update the new client so that I can transfer my account to Japan.
I've been waiting for this for over a month...
3 years later and still no region transfer available, I've lost hope entirely and will start to learn how to play with 240 ping...
Was an update, I got my hopes up and then crushed right away :/
Same here..
PLEASE LORD IVE WAITED FOREVER TO TRANSFER BACK TO MY DAMN COUNTRY. LOL DONT YOU WANT MY MONEY ?!?!?!?!?!?!
I can't transfer either

same here
I submitted two tickets and they said on November 20 I should be able to transfer but still can't. needles to say that they do not provide free start season transfer like other games such as WOW.
Same, I haven't played in a while now due to waiting for this and I still don't have the option to transfer
